testsuite.name: FileServerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
The server should stop after a client sends 'exit'!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
stdout: Server started! Client started! Sent: Give me everything you have! Received: Give me everything you have! Received: 400 Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit Received: exit The request was sent. Server started!
stderr: Exception in thread "Thread-3" org.hyperskill.hstest.dynamic.security.ExitException: Tried to exit with status 0. at org.hyperskill.hstest.dynamic.security.TestingSecurityManager.checkExit(TestingSecurityManager.java:50) at java.base/java.lang.Runtime.exit(Runtime.java:113) at java.base/java.lang.System.exit(System.java:1860) at server.Server.handleRequest(Server.java:89) at server.Server.handleClient(Server.java:69) at server.Server.lambda$listen$0(Server.java:44) at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:833)
